SMS Logistics Inc.

Swift. Secure. SMS. – Your Trusted Logistics Partner

Get a Quote About Us

Delivering Excellence, One Shipment at a Time.

A Smarter Way to Move

At SMS Logistics Inc., we provide swift, secure, and seamless transportation solutions across Canada and the U.S. Whether you need Full Truckload (FTL), Less-than-Truckload (LTL), or expedited shipments, we ensure your goods reach their destination on time and in perfect condition.

Reliable Freight Solutions

We offer comprehensive logistics services, including freight forwarding, warehousing, supply chain management, and customized transportation strategies tailored to your business needs.

Your Trusted Logistics Partner

With over a decade of experience, we are committed to efficiency, reliability, and customer satisfaction. Our technology-driven solutions ensure smooth and cost-effective delivery.

Industry Expertise

From retail and e-commerce to manufacturing, automotive, food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, and technology, we support a wide range of industries, delivering logistics solutions that keep supply chains running smoothly.

SMS Logistics connects businesses across North America with dependable and secure freight solutions. Let’s move forward together!
